name: Logitech MX Master 2
description: The Logitech MX Master 3 is the most advanced Master Series mouse yet. It offers precise control and features a sleek design.

name: Razer DeathAdder V2
description: Razer DeathAdder V2 is a wired mouse that provides superior gaming performance with a 20,000 DPI optical sensor.

name: Corsair Dark Core RGB/SE
description: Corsair Dark Core RGB/SE is a wireless mouse with Qi wireless charging and customizable RGB lighting.

name: Apple Magic Mouse 2
description: Apple Magic Mouse 2 is a wireless, rechargeable mouse with a multi-touch surface. It's a must-have for any Mac user.

name: SteelSeries Rival 600
description: SteelSeries Rival 600 is a gaming mouse featuring dual sensors and a comfortable design for long gaming sessions.
